text: Kevin Zachary Afghani (born November 9, 1996) is an American voice actor. He is best known for being the voice actor for Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Waluigi, beginning with the Nintendo Switch games Super Mario Bros. Wonder, WarioWare: Move It!, and Super Mario Party Jamboree, following Charles Martinet's retirement as the characters' voice role and transition to Mario official brand ambassador. Prior to his voice roles, Afghani provided voiceover work for Nintendo Switch commercials and Arnold in the English dub of Genshin Impact. == Career == Afghani succeeded Mario voice actor Charles Martinet in the role beginning with Super Mario Bros. Wonder, while the original voice actor became Mario's brand ambassador. == Life == Kevin Zachary Afghani was born on November 9, 1996. Afghani works and resides in Los Angeles, California. ==Other Websites== https://www.kevinzafghani.com/bio https://www.behindthevoiceactors.com/Kevin-Z-Afghani/ Category:American voice actors Category:1996 births Category:Living people
title: Kevin Afghani
